creator: reachrishav

title: Firefox Crashing Mac
content:
Hi there, I know I'm not the only one with this issue. But I have yet to find an answer on all the other threads so maybe if I create a new one something will happen.

I have been using firefox without issue for years. However, in the past year, firefox has started crashing repeatedly on my Mac. I have updated both firefox and the mac itself several times since the issue first presented itself and yet the problem still persists.

I am running the latest version of both the OS and firefox and the program still crashes. In fact it did so just a few minutes ago and destroyed a good hours work that cannot be recovered.

I am hoping this issue will get some kind of response soon before I am forced to migrate my devices to a new browser in order to get a stable experience.
creator: michaelpace

title: I can not access www.tangerine.ca anymore.
content:
For years I have had no problem accessing the website www.tangerine.ca. Since it is a financial site, I refuse to save the passwords on my computer. On the first screen I type in my account number (which I DO NOT save) but NOW the process simply goes come back to the original screen after a few seconds. The site would normally take me to a page for an answer to a security question and then a 3rd page for my password.

I have no trouble accessing this site using Opera or Edge

There is some sort of Firefox setting preventing me from getting past the first page on the website. I contacted Tangerine and of course they recommended I us Google Chrome. I have deleted all history, saved shortcuts but to no avail

I hope you can help. If not, I'll have to return to Opera or Edge

Thanks Mike Cee

title: Hiba történt a következőhöz csatlakozáskor: www.facebook.com. SSL_ERROR_DC_EXPIRED
content:
Üdvözlöm. Nem tudok a facebook oldalalamra belépni. A telefonon és más számítógépen működik.Ezt írja ki:A biztonságos kapcsolat sikertelen

Hiba történt a következőhöz csatlakozáskor: www.facebook.com. SSL_ERROR_DC_EXPIRED 

   A megtekinteni kívánt oldal nem jeleníthető meg, mert a kapott adatok hitelessége nem ellenőrizhető.    Lépjen kapcsolatba a webhely üzemeltetőjével, és értesítse a problémáról.

Köszönöm előre is a segítséget!
